accepted-slave-amount.description: Amount of Slaves allocated to the Instance which are deployed

domain.description: Base domain used by the instance

master-key-generate-auth-url.description: URL to GET once auth for master-key-upload-url

master-key-upload-url.description: URL to PUT PEM bundle of main certificate and key

rejected-slave-amount.description: Rejected Amount of Slaves allocated to the Instance which are not deployed

rejected-slave-dict.description: Dict of slaves which were rejected. Keys are slave references, values are lists of errors on slaves.

slave-amount.description: Total amount of Slaves allocated to the Instance (include blocked ones)

kedifa-csr-url.description: URL on which KeDiFa publishes its CSR sent to caucase.

kedifa-csr-certificate.description: Certificate used to serve data on kedifa-csr-url.

kedifa-caucase-url.description: Url to caucase used by KeDiFa.

frontend-node-N-kedifa-csr-url.description: URL on which frontend node number N publishes its Kedifa CSR sent to caucase.

frontend-node-N-backend-client-csr-url.description: URL on which frontend node number N publishes its Backend Client CSR sent to caucase.

frontend-node-N-csr-certificate.description: Certificate used to serve data on CSRs.

warning-slave-dict.description: Dict of slaves which got warnings. Keys are slave references, values are lists of warnings on slaves.

warning-list.description: List of warning found during the request.

backend-client-caucase-url.description: URL to caucase used by authentication to the backend.
